USA Thomas Morgan and Alfred Sturtevant prepare the first chromosome map, showing five sex-linked genes in the fruit fly

Bunn discover the structure of penicillin

England Joseph Priestley and Carl Scheele independently discover

Germany Joseph von Fraunhofer invents the diffraction grating for studying spectra
